Included patient F-MISO PET follow brain MRI ( MRI-1 ) ( diffusion , FLAIR , perfusion , TOF ) soon possible stroke onset ( le 36 hour ) . A second brain MRI ( MRI-2 ) perform day 7 . The aim study locate hypoxic tissue compare ischemic tissue define diffusion FLAIR MRI sequence , MRI evolution , clinical status day 7 day 90 .
